front.title: Unknown Key Share Attacks on uses of Transport Layer Security with the Session Description Protocol (SDP)

abstract.t: This document describes unknown key-share attacks on the use of Datagram Transport Layer Security for the Secure Real-Time Transport Protocol (DTLS-SRTP). Similar attacks are described on the use of DTLS-SRTP with Web Real-Time Communications (WebRTC) identity assertions. Both attacks cause a victim to be mislead about the identity of a communicating peer. Simple mitigation techniques are defined for each.
